IT'S JUST NOT RIGHT

Newport 0 Yeltz 0

30 October 1999

I suppose a lot of Welshmen like to watch the egg-chasing, but it still seems a bit bizarre kicking off at 12.15.

It must have been a bit strange for the players too, but the mightywith a creditablewith high-flying. They've climbed up to second-place, and we've snuck into the top half of the table into.
